name: @solana/nominal-types
description: Type utilties for creating nominal/branded types in TypeScript
author: Solana Labs Maintainers <maintainers@solanalabs.com>

scripts.publish-impl: npm view $npm_package_name@$npm_package_version > /dev/null 2>&1 || (pnpm publish --tag ${PUBLISH_TAG:-canary} --access public --no-git-checks && (([ "$PUBLISH_TAG" != "canary" ] && pnpm dist-tag add $npm_package_name@$npm_package_version latest) || true))
scripts.style:fix: pnpm eslint --fix src && pnpm prettier --log-level warn --ignore-unknown --write ./*
